Overview¶

pytraj is a Python front-end package of the popular cpptraj program.

  1. Why bother using pytraj?

    If you want to extend cpptraj’s functionanity to Python eco-system such as numpy, scipy, pandas, sklearn and many more. Check some examples here

  2. What does pytraj offer?

    • support many types of analysis

    • support parallel processing

    • able to handle many files at the same time

    • able to handle very large trajectory

    • simple (and fast) calculation

      import pytraj as pt traj = pt.iterload(‘traj.nc’, ‘my_parm.top’) pt.radgyr(traj)

    • include many cpptraj features
      • automatic file detection by its content
      • smart autoimage function for PBC simulation.
      • ... (to be filled soon)

    • able to be used in other langues, such as Julia

  3. How to get started

    • check installation
    • do some Tutorials
    • get reference by Index
